explanation: All tokens except 'OCEAN' contain at least one double letter.
All tokens except 'Liter' are common units used to measure length or distance. 'Liter' is a unit for measuring volume.

All words except 'FLOP' can be spelled backwards to form another common English word: FLOW (WOLF), STOP (POTS), STRESSED (DESSERTS), and DECAF (FACED). 'FLOP' spelled backwards ('POLF') is not a recognized word.
